questions.question: We went ………………………. on the weekend.
questions.description: There is no preposition in the expression go swimming, go walking, go climbing etc.

questions.question: Let’s go ………………………… drive next weekend.
questions.description: This is a common expression referring to leisure activities.

questions.question: I went swimming ………………………… the sea.
questions.description: Prepositions of place are used after go + …ing.

questions.question: Don’t go skating ………………………….. the lake.
questions.description: Prepositions of place are used after go + …ing.

questions.question: We went shopping ……………………… Dubai.
questions.description: Prepositions of place are used after go + …ing.

questions.question: She ………………………….. mend her ways.
questions.description: Had better is used to give strong advice.

questions.question: Half of my friends ……………………… abroad.
questions.description: When the noun following half of is plural, we use a plural verb.

questions.question: I had scarcely closed my eyes ………………………. I heard a knock on the door.
questions.description: Scarcely is followed by when or before.

questions.question: No sooner had I closed the door ………………………….. someone knocked.
questions.description: We use than after no sooner.

questions.question: She was hardly inside the house ………………………… the lights went out.
questions.description: Hardly is followed by when or before.

questions.question: She had no sooner agreed to marry him than she ……………………… having serious doubts.
